mobile.name: poor mudder
mobile.long_descr: A poor mudder, lost in this place.
mobile.description: You will become him if you are not careful.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: star
mobile.long_descr: A beautiful white star smiles at you.
mobile.description: You can't tell what the star looks like, she is too bright!

mobile.name: nebula young
mobile.long_descr: A young nebula, waiting to become a star.
mobile.description: It hasn't got a definite shape, it is just a cloud of mist.

mobile.name: comet speedy
mobile.long_descr: A speedy comet is waiting to crush your head in.
mobile.description: You see the offspring of Halley's comet, here just to wipe everything out.

mobile.name: red supergiant
mobile.long_descr: An enormous, red supergiant is forced to protect the galaxy.
mobile.description:
You notice the giant is not as tough as his name sounds ...
                   |Still he can be very powerful.

mobile.name: white dwarf
mobile.long_descr: A tiny white dwarf is trying to sneak away from duty.
mobile.description:
Like the red giant, he is also appointed to stand guard for the galaxy.
                   |But somehow he manages to escape.  Though tiny, it can take a lot of hits!

mobile.name: horsehead nebula
mobile.long_descr: A huge nebula is here, resembling a horsehead.
mobile.description:
You can only make out its shape from the darkness.  He was cursed to stay in
                   |here and his face may never be seen by anyone again.

mobile.name: andromeda
mobile.long_descr: The poor Andromeda is chained to the wall, suffering ...
mobile.description:
She was once a princess of beauty.  However, her beauty has led to a Goddess's
                   |jealousy and she has to suffer here endlessly until Perseus comes.

mobile.name: hercules
mobile.long_descr: The Mighty Hercules is working hard on his extra Labours for the Gods.
mobile.description:
He has been put to do the Ten Labours -- ten impossible tasks, by Hera, the
                   |queen goddess, who disliked him.  But he finished them all and at the end was
                   |granted immortality. He is a very brave and strong fighter.

mobile.name: pegasus
mobile.long_descr: The wild pegasus is grazing peacefully.
mobile.description: It is the legendary horse with wings on its back.

mobile.name: orion
mobile.long_descr: Orion is still hunting for Scorpio.
mobile.description:
He is the legendary hunter who almost defeated Taurus the bull, but got
                   |killed by Scorpio.  The gods put them both up as constellations but one
                   |appears on one side of the sky and the other the other side so they will
                   |never meet.

mobile.name: pleiades
mobile.long_descr: The Pleiades are here, weeping for the loss of their sisters.
mobile.description:
These are the seven sisters of the Myths, and as for why they are here, no
                   |one knows; even the Gods themselves have forgotten.

mobile.name: draco head
mobile.long_descr: The gigantic Head of Draco lurks out from beneath and prepares to roast you.
mobile.description:
This evil-looking head is even larger than a giant.  He is the last guardian 
                   |before entering the inner galaxy.  His neck is flexing in a random fashion so 
                   |hitting the head is certainly not easy.

mobile.name: draco baby
mobile.long_descr: A baby draco is crawling on the Draco's body.
mobile.description:
You see a tiny creature which looks like a dragon except that its body
                   |resembles a snake.  Gosh, is this a draco, you wonder, is this the thing
                   |we are on now?

mobile.name: aries
mobile.long_descr: Aries is sitting here, welcoming you.
mobile.description:
You see a white goat here, the first guardian of the Zodiac,
                   |also the ruler of Spring. He looks as if he is expecting you.

mobile.name: taurus
mobile.long_descr: Taurus wants to leave, but has been forced to stay as a guardian here.
mobile.description:
You see a wild-looking bull with a bad temper.  He is well-built and looks like 
                   |he can fight well ... indeed he has fought with Orion before and survived.

mobile.name: gemini
mobile.long_descr: Gemini is looking for his brother; have you seen him?
mobile.description:
As soon as you see him you know that he is the most perfect man you have seen.
                   |You can't find any imperfections on him.

mobile.name: gemini
mobile.long_descr: Gemini is hiding from his brother, grinning evilly at you.
mobile.description:
As soon as you see him you see the most imperfect man you have ever seen.
                   |How can there be such a contrast?  You wonder ...
mobile.mob_flags: sentinel scavenger aggressive stay_area wimpy cleric

mobile.name: cancer
mobile.long_descr: Cancer the crab is here, hoarding the treasure away from you.
mobile.description:
You see a gigantic crab (YES, it is bigger than you!) with a crushed shell.
                   |Legend is that he was crushed by Hercules when he was sent by Hera to kill him.
                   |So Hera made Cancer a constellation for his work.

mobile.name: leo
mobile.long_descr: Leo the lion is roaring at you, ready for a strike!
mobile.description:
His metallic skin means that he could be the one which was killed by Hercules
                   |during his first Labour.  His skin is so weapon-proof that Hercules had to use
                   |his bare hands to tear the lion into two from its mouth!

mobile.name: virgo
mobile.long_descr: Virgo is sitting here, winking at you suggestively ... you are alarmed!
mobile.description:
From what you have seen, you now realize that legends are legends, and Virgo
                   |may not be the maid of chastity and purity at all!  But still she looks
                   |gorgeous and is waiting for your first move, whatever it is ...

mobile.name: libra
mobile.long_descr: Libra, the fair and just, is staring at you, weighing up the sins of your past.
mobile.description:
He is a wise old man and can see people's thoughts through their eyes....
                   |Now all he can see from you is greed and bloodshed.

mobile.name: scorpio
mobile.long_descr: Scorpio is moving his tail towards you, waiting to put an end to some mortals.
mobile.description:
Ever since he killed Orion in the myths, he has been punished by having 
                   |Sagittarius' arrow aimed at his heart forever.

mobile.name: sagittarius
mobile.long_descr: Sagittarius the centaur is waiting to let go of his well aimed arrow ...
mobile.description: He is a centaur and a well trained archer. No one can escape his arrows.

mobile.name: capricorn
mobile.long_descr: Capricorn is here, feeling bored ... he wants a fight!
mobile.description:
You see a mean-looking ram here.  He used to be a fierce fighter in the ancient
                   |war but now the gods have decided to put him here, to live out the rest of his 
                   |days in peace.

mobile.name: aquarius
mobile.long_descr: The beautiful Aquarius is standing here, holding THE vessel.
mobile.description:
The pretty Water Bearer is smiling at you, you think you'd better give her a 
                   |hand with holding the vessel.

mobile.name: pisces mermaid
mobile.long_descr: Pisces the mermaid is sitting here, waiting for your help.
mobile.description:
She has been forced to serve her husband, who had been cursed to turn into a
                   |fish and she deserves your pity.

mobile.name: pisces fish
mobile.long_descr: Pisces the fish, is jealous of your approach...
mobile.description:
He was once a very handsome man but now has turned into an ugly big fish.
                   |So he becomes jealous of any living thing which is more handsome than him.

mobile.name: bear ursa major
mobile.long_descr: Ursa Major the bear is the last defense against any intruders.
mobile.description:
The Huge Bear which resides in the northern skies is here. 
                   |You think you'd better turn back.  At least you have got a chance of survival.

mobile.name: cassiopeia queen
mobile.long_descr: Cassiopeia, the queen of the Universe, is sitting on her throne.
mobile.description: She is the Queen of Dignity; facing her you feel all your dignity has gone.

mobile.name: cepheus king
mobile.long_descr: Cepheus, the king of the Universe, is sitting on his throne.
mobile.description:
He is the King of Might as well as of the Universe. You suddenly feel very
                   |weak and useless in front of him.

mobile.name: polaris polar star
mobile.long_descr: Polaris, the polar star, who commands the whole Universe, stands before you!
mobile.description:
He is the Master of the Universe, (NOT He-Man!), the most powerful!  
                   |Even the King and the Queen obey him.  As you look at him you notice he is 
                   |actually a STAR, with dazzling bright light ... maybe you shouldn't have come
                   |here at all?
